name: EventCountdownReminder
0:
”Alexa, open event countdown reminder”
”Alexa, start event countdown reminder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: event countdown reminder
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until a predefined event set by the skill developer. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for that specific event. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
